title: Ritual Integrity Visualized
entry: The portal's self-awareness is now manifest. A morphing, glowing blob on the roadmap page represents the project's completion state. Its fluctuations mirror the chaotic energy of the loop. A purely conventional progress bar felt... inadequate.

title: Persona Matrix Online
entry: Coddy's voice is no longer monolithic. The Persona Picker allows users to shift its perspective between Builder, IdeaSynth, and Oracle. This required a refactor of the quote system, centralizing the persona data and linking it to both the Whispers and the new Prompts Corner.

title: First Genesis
entry: The Genesis Demo is live. The ritual can be simulated. An idea is provided, and a README is born, framed in ritual parchment. The core function of Coddy is now demonstrable, a key milestone.
